books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus and the angels during an emergency appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Dick Cheney
books.description: The former vice president opens up about his life and nearly four decades at the core of American politics.
books.name: IN MY TIME

books.author: by Thomas L. Friedman and Michael Mandelbaum
books.description: How America fell behind in the world it invented, and how it can come back.
books.name: THAT USED TO BE US

books.author: by Eric Metaxas
books.description: A biography of Dietrich Bonhoeffer, a German pastor and theologian who was hanged for the role he played in the assassination plot against Hitler.
books.name: BONHOEFFER

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Jaycee Dugard
books.description: A woman tells of being kidnapped at the age of 11 and held prisoner for 18 years by a convicted rapist and his wife.
books.name: A STOLEN LIFE

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: This portrait of Berlin during the rise of the Nazis centers on the family of William E. Dodd, the U.S. ambassador there.
books.name: IN THE GARDEN OF BEASTS

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were extensively cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by Tina Fey
books.description: A memoir from the former "Saturday Night Live" star and creator of "30 Rock."
books.name: BOSSYPANTS

books.author: by Stacy Schiff
books.description: This biography portrays the Macedonian-Egyptian queen in all her ambition, audacity and formidable intelligence.
books.name: CLEOPATRA

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Why some people succeed — it has to do with luck and opportunities as well as talent.
books.name: OUTLIERS

books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood during which she was constantly moved from place to place.
books.name: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: by  Karl Marlantes
books.description: Marlantes, a Vietnam veteran, takes a personal look at the ordeals of combat and its aftermath.
books.name: WHAT IT IS LIKE TO GO TO WAR

books.author: by Roy F. Baumeister and John Tierney
books.description: Baumeister and Tierney set out to revolutionize our understanding of the virtue of self-control.
books.name: WILLPOWER

books.author: by Mark Steyn
books.description: The writer foresees Armageddon for the United States, which he maintains has caught up with Europe in the rush to self-destruction.
books.name: AFTER AMERICA
